[[include :scp-wiki:info:start]]
[[=]]
[[include component:preview
text= You feel the sting of the needle stabbing into your tongue and the sweet release of combat stimulants into your bloodstream. 
]]
[[=image https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/fuckhead/Thumbnail.gif style="width: 20%"]]


++ FUCKHEAD
----

**Word Count:** 13k~
[[/=]]

----
[[=]]
⚠️ **Content warning:** This story contains gore, strong language, blasphemy, mental and emotional abuse, domestic abuse and violence, violence, American politics, war crimes, and antisemitism.
[[/=]]
